summary: French army's seventh company experiences severe setback during world war 2 when it gets separated from other members of the army.They disguise as army officers to escape death when they are caught by German soldiers.
cast: Jean Lefebvre|Pierre Mondy|Henri Guybet|Pierre Tornade|Bernard Dhéran|Jacques Monod|René Bouloc|Robert Dalban|Jean Rougerie|Erik Colin|Robert Lamoureux|Hubert Deschamps|Gerd Ammann|Marc Ariche|Nadia Barentin|Jerry Brouer|François Cadet|Bernard Charlan|Gino Da Ronch|Daniel Delprat|Paul Bisciglia|Suzanne Grey|Bernard Lajarrige|Paul Mercey|Michel Modo|Jackie Sardou|Robert Rollis|Herbert Fiala|Marcel Gassouk|Alexandre Grecq|Patrick Lancelot|Jean-Jacques Moreau|Franz Sauer|Maurice Travail|Jean-Pierre Zola
title: Hemos encontrado a la 7ª compañia
